name: Happy and Grumpy
description:
Be Happy or Grumpy, but play together:

This Game has 2Dimensions EVERYWHERE:
 - real different 2Dimensions (The Grumpy and the Happy Dimension)
 - 2Players
 - 2 Colors
 - 2 Enemys
 - 2 Lifes
 - 2 Screens

Shoot to change the Dimension, and bash to destroy enemys from other Dimensions. Overcome Obstacles and find your corresponding other.

Music:
Ketsa : Seeing you Again

Code:
all by myself, with the help of a few tutorials

Controls:
Grumpy:
 Walk: Left and Right Arrows
Jump: Up Arrow
Shoot: J
Dash: K

Happy:

 Walk: A and D
Jump: W
Shoot: F
Dash: G

Feel Free to download those pngs on the right side.

This Game was made for the United Game Jam
